name: node-nunjucks-boilerplate
description: Boilerplate for Express server with Nunjucks, PostCSS and Babel (ES6 preset)

scripts.start: node server.js & npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && node ./scripts/build-html.js && npm run build:assets
scripts.build:css: node_modules/postcss-cli/bin/postcss -u postcss-import -u postcss-custom-properties -u postcss-custom-media -u postcss-apply -u postcss-nested -u autoprefixer -u cssnano -o dist/assets/index.css src/index.css

author: Reinout Eppinga
